selected_quotes: #SWOGonc 9704: Early stem cell trnsplnt in aggressive non-Hodgkin #lymphoma: OS improved only in pts at highest risk
Autologous transplant for aggressive lymphoma, either upfront or at relapse, is associated with similar survival
Consolidación con autotrasplante en NHL Agresivo de riesgo intermedio/alto y alto aumenta PFS, pero no el OS -

citation.abstract: The efficacy of autologous stem-cell transplantation during the first remission in patients with diffuse, aggressive non-Hodgkin's lymphoma classified as high-intermediate risk or high risk on the International Prognostic Index remains controversial and is untested in the rituximab era.
citation.title: Autologous Transplantation as Consolidation for Aggressive Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma

news.title: New study evaluates early stem cell transplants for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma
news.summary: Performing early stem cell transplants in patients with aggressive non-Hodgkin's lymphoma does not improve overall survival in high-risk patients, according to a study published in the New England Journal of Medicine.

news.title: NEJM Study Evaluates Early Stem Cell Transplants for Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
news.summary: Early stem cell transplants for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma do not improve overall survival in high-risk patients. But early transplantation does appear to benefit very high-risk patients, according to a study in the New England Journal of Medicine.

news.title: Early stem cell transplants does not improve overall survival in non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients
news.summary: Performing early stem cell transplants in patients with aggressive non-Hodgkin's lymphoma does not improve overall survival in high-risk patients, according to a study published in the New England Journal of Medicine.

news.title: Stem-Cell Therapy Misses Mark in Lymphoma Trial (CME/CE)
news.summary: (MedPage Today) -- Progression of aggressive non-Hodgkin's lymphoma slowed significantly after autologous stem-cell transplantation, although overall survival did not improve, according to results of a randomized trial.
